attributes.action: Expose Companies & Corporations That Sell Non-Serviceable Goods!
attributes.background:
Regulate & inspect companies and corporations. Consumers will be informed at the point of sale if non-serviceable goods are being sold. Introduce higher taxes even fines for non-serviceable goods. Introduce servicing ratings.
Stop the throw away society and encourage repair instead of replace

rejection.details: We're not sure how you would like "non-serviceable" goods to be defined. You could start a new petition explaining more clearly what action you would like the Government or Parliament to take.
